items.content_html: type-ioc is a TypeScript-based, lightweight, and extensible Inversion of Control (IoC) container that provides a clean and efficient way to manage dependencies and service registrations. Inspired by the principles of dependency injection seen in Java frameworks, this project brings similar functionality to Node.js/TypeScript development.
